What are the treatments for juvenile Batten disease ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of juvenile Batten disease:  - Batten Disease Diagnostic and Clinical Research Center at the University of Rochester Medical Center  - Batten Disease Support and Research Association: Centers of Excellence  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Neuronal Ceroid-Lipofu
